original_text: Do things that the Lord says are right and good. If you do that, you will be happy in everything that you do. You will go into the good land that he promised to your ancestors, and that will be your home.
korean_text: 여호와께서 보시기에 정직하고 선량한 일을 행하라 그리하면 네가 복을 받고 그 땅에 들어가서 네 조상들에게 맹세하신 아름다운 땅을 차지하리니

sentences.original_text: Do things that the Lord says are right and good
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 옳고 선하다고 말씀하신 일들을 하라

sentences.original_text: you will be happy in everything that you do
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 하는 모든 일에서 복을 누릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: You will go into the good land
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 좋은 땅에 들어갈 것이고

sentences.original_text: that he promised to your ancestors
and that will be your home
